Title: Lowering the ban System Competitive (CS:GO): We can make the CS:GO comp ban system better by the Community!
Overview:
Who does not know the feeling of sadness when you get Ban from CS: GO Competitive for 7 DAYS!!!
I'm here because I'm getting banned week after week and it's tired!!
C'mon Sign the petition and we reduce the system to a max one-day ban.
Because it is tired of everyone which is annoying so if we can get enough signatures we can say to Valve system should lower the Ban.
So Register and start to distribute it to your friends :).
We will make the CS:GO Competitive 2 a better place.
Today I got more time ban from Competitive And it's happning Because the reason should get it for only half an hour I got Disconnect with the internet shit and I could not go back and suddenly "Competitive Cooldown".
If you do not want to happen to you again Ban week!!!
Sign the petition and maybe win it.
Turn your signature into dozens more by sharing this petition and recruiting people you know to sign.
Letter Body: We can make the CS:GO comp ban system better by the Community
